{"id":890447220,"question_id":6,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"1 year, 1 month","timestamp":1675394917,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"3 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/890447220/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Zigzag Conversion","memory":"10.6 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    string convert(string s, int numRows) {\n        if(numRows == 1) return s;\n        vector<string>tmp(numRows);\n        int vy = -1, i = 0;\n        for(auto c: s){\n            tmp[i].push_back(c);\n            if(i == numRows - 1 || i == 0) vy = -vy;\n            i += vy;\n        }\n        string ans = \"\";\n        for(auto i: tmp) ans += i;\n        return ans;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"zigzag-conversion","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
